section.p: Test Management System (TMS) has the purpose of managing test cases, ensuring all product requirements are being covered by traceable test cases.

It facilitates:
test case definition
metadata association
test case grouping
filtering.

ul.li: Web based (modern design - HTML5 + CSS2/3), using UI-SDK
High Availability Application Server / Database, hosted in Linkoping HUB

section.p: TM ensures test case traceability, assigning a global unique ID to each test case on its creation. Test case ID is linked to parent requirement in the Requirement Management Tool (e.g. JIRA).

TM has been designed in a modular approach and can be integrated into different Requirement Management Tools and IDEs, via plug-ins. At the moment, TAF TM is integrated with PDU OSS JIRA enabling the linking of TAF TM test cases to JIRA requirements.

TMS helps to ensure that all test cases and testware are identified and designed with great care. Without test case identification and proper description, over time, the traceability of why and by whom the test cases were created would be lost.
